= Keybinds =

== Basic ==
* `Enter` - Toggle between single image and gallery mode
* `b` - Toggle info bar

== Thumbnail mode ==

== Image mode ==
* `n`, `Space` - Next image
* `p`, `Backspace` - Previous image
=== Zooming ===
* `=` - Set zoom to 100%
* `w` - Set zoom to 100%, but fit large images into window
* `W` - Fit image to window
* `e` - Fit image to window width
* `E` - Fit image to window height

== Scripts ==
* `Ctrl-x w` - Set the wallpaper to selected image
* `Ctrl-x l` - Set the lockscreen wallpaper to selected image
